languages.text: "У нас схожая судьба. Я тоже оказал{mf|ся|ась} в плену, и ксеносы тоже заставили меня убивать ради своего развлечения".
"We suffer the same fate. I was also captured by the xenos and they have forced me to kill for their entertainment."
languages.original_text: "У нас схожая судьба. Я тоже оказал{mf|ся|ась} в плену, и ксеносы тоже заставили меня убивать ради своего развлечения".

traits.locale_text: "We suffer the same fate. I was also captured by the xenos and they have forced me to kill for their entertainment."
"We suffer the same fate. I was also captured by the xenos and they have forced me to kill for their entertainment."
"We suffer the same fate. I was also captured by the xenos and they have forced me to kill for their entertainment."
"We suffer the same fate. I was also captured by the xenos and they have forced me to kill for their entertainment."

languages.text: “我和你遭受了同样的命运。我也遭到了异形的俘虏，他们强迫我杀戮，供他们取乐。”
languages.original_text: "We suffer the same fate. I was also captured by the xenos and they have forced me to kill for their entertainment."

traits.locale_text: “我和你遭受了同样的命运。我也遭到了异形的俘虏，他们强迫我杀戮，供他们取乐。”

languages.text: 「我々は同じ目に遭った。{mf|俺|私}も異種族に囚われ、奴らの娯楽のために殺しを強制された」
languages.original_text: "We suffer the same fate. I was also captured by the xenos and they have forced me to kill for their entertainment."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は同じ目に遭った。{mf|俺|私}も異種族に囚われ、奴らの娯楽のために殺しを強制された」

languages.text: «Sufrimos un mismo destino. Yo también he sido capturad{mf|o|a} por xenos y me han obligado a matar para su disfrute».
languages.original_text: "We suffer the same fate. I was also captured by the xenos and they have forced me to kill for their entertainment."

traits.locale_text: «Sufrimos un mismo destino. Yo también he sido capturad{mf|o|a} por xenos y me han obligado a matar para su disfrute».

languages.text: « Nous sommes dans la même situation, vous et moi. J'ai aussi été {mf|capturé|capturée} par les xénos qui m'ont {mf|forcé|forcée} à tuer pour les divertir. »
languages.original_text: "We suffer the same fate. I was also captured by the xenos and they have forced me to kill for their entertainment."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes dans la même situation, vous et moi. J'ai aussi été {mf|capturé|capturée} par les xénos qui m'ont {mf|forcé|forcée} à tuer pour les divertir. »

languages.text: "Wir tragen dasselbe Schicksal. Ich wurde auch von den Xenos gefangen genommen, und ich muss zu ihrer Unterhaltung töten."
languages.original_text: "We suffer the same fate. I was also captured by the xenos and they have forced me to kill for their entertainment."

traits.locale_text: "Wir tragen dasselbe Schicksal. Ich wurde auch von den Xenos gefangen genommen, und ich muss zu ihrer Unterhaltung töten."

languages.text: "Aynı kaderin kurbanlarıyız. Beni de zenolar kaçırdı, sırf eğlencesine öldürmeye zorladılar."
languages.original_text: "We suffer the same fate. I was also captured by the xenos and they have forced me to kill for their entertainment."

traits.locale_text: "Aynı kaderin kurbanlarıyız. Beni de zenolar kaçırdılar ve sırf eğlencesine öldürmeye zorladılar."
